txt_en: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
txt_cn: 被爱使你强大，爱人让你勇敢。

txt_en: I need to focus on going down the right path.
txt_cn: 我得集中精力，走一条正确的路。

txt_en: To be a sailor of the world bound for all ports.
txt_cn: 做个水手，遨游世界，四处航行。

txt_en: You are loved, and you are not alone.
txt_cn: 有人爱着你，你不是孤身一人。

txt_en: Hard work is the recipe for success.
Take charge of your life for as long as it lasts.
Sometimes the right path is not the easiest one.
txt_cn: 正确的道路有时最难走。

txt_en: Teachers encouraged us to break the status quo and define ourselves as we choose.
txt_cn: 老师鼓励我们打破现状，成就自我。

txt_en: I love you just the way you are.
Even the darkest moment can turn into something sweet.
txt_cn: 度过至暗时刻，我们终将收获甜美成果。
